Uses of Shape in mcm.graphics
 

Subclasses of Shape in mcm.graphics
 class DirectionShape
          An elliptical shape that shows its orientation.
 class EllipseShape
          An ellipse shape.
 class FillableShape
          FillableShapes wrap awt shapes that may be rendered by draw or fill calls.
 class ImageShape
          ImageShape objects wrap an ImageIcon.
 class LineShape
          A line shape.
 class RectangleShape
          A rectangle shape.
 class SizedShape
          SizedShapes wrap awt shapes that may be rendered by draw calls.
 class TextShape
          TextShapes serve to display one line Strings
 class TriangleShape
          An triangle shape.
 

Methods in mcm.graphics that return Shape
 Shape Shape.getClone()
          Creates a clone of this Shape and returns it.
 Shape Body.getShape()
          Returns a reference to the body's shape.
 

Methods in mcm.graphics with parameters of type Shape
protected  void Shape.cloneProps(Shape template)
          Copy template's color and lineWidth properties into this object
 void Body.setShape(Shape shape)
          Sets the body's shape to the given shape.
